content.c_answer2: The Lion King has been playing at the Lyceum Theatre in London's West End for the last twenty four years. There has been a theatre in the Covent Garden area called the Lyceum since 1765. The theatre has been used for a host of activities in the last 247 years and is one of the UK's most prominent and important theatres. It is one of the largest theatres in the West End, with over 2100 seats.
content.name: Where is The Lion King showing?
